analysis.description:
FKXSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#492-494) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#493-494)

FKXSale.mintBaseLockedTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#505-521) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,baseTokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#515)
	-token.mint(tokenLock,bonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#517-518)

FKXSale.mintLockedTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#531-546) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenLock,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#542)

FKXSale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol)

FKXSale.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenLock.releaseAll(from,to) (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol)

FKXTokenTimeLock.releaseAll has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)(token.transfer(beneficiary,lock.amount)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x375b3ff1df2288630a5372c484ce3f2095e832f3.sol#446-448)
